ModMetaData.name: Comigo's Nutrition
ModMetaData.author: Comigo Games
ModMetaData.description:
Smaller, more efficient cooking sites and paste dispensers: ideal for spaceships and small bases.
This is a mod that adds a new research tab and doesn't simply replace the existing benches; it adds the new ones locked under separate research projects. They are relatively cheap, but are required for each new bench.
